sentences.en: Constraints and decisions of the reasons for juvenile delinquency diverse and complex.
sentences.cn: 制约和决定未成年人犯罪的原因多种多样,错综复杂.

sentences.en: Draft Guidelines for the Prevention of Juvenile Delinquency ( Guidelines of Riyadh )
sentences.cn: 预防少年犯罪准则草案 ( 利雅得准则草案 )

sentences.en: Guidelines for the Prevention of Juvenile Delinquency ( Guidelines of Riyadh )
sentences.cn: 预防少年犯罪准则 ( 利雅得准则 )

sentences.en: He is an expert in juvenile delinquency.
sentences.cn: 他是研究青少年犯罪的专家.

sentences.en: It has the vital significance to prevent and reduce juvenile delinquency.
sentences.cn: 对预防和减少重新犯罪具有重要意义.

sentences.en: Juvenile delinquency should make us reflect on the current situation.
sentences.cn: 未成年人犯罪令人警省,发人深思.

sentences.en: Juvenile violations and delinquency have a close relation with environmental factors.
sentences.cn: 青少年违法犯罪与环境影响关系表现得非常明显.

sentences.en: Network life is becoming the hotbed and soil of juvenile delinquency.
sentences.cn: 网络生活正成为青少年犯罪的温床与土壤.

sentences.en: Psychologists are dealing with the problem of maladjusted adolescence and " juvenile delinquency ".
sentences.cn: 心理学家对付着不适应环境的青少年和 “ 青少年犯罪 ” 的问题.

sentences.en: Some people say that violent movies are potential triggers for juvenile delinquency.
sentences.cn: 一些人说暴力影片可能引起青少年犯罪.

sentences.en: The authorities are at their wits'end about juvenile delinquency.
sentences.cn: 当局对青少年犯罪束手无策.

sentences.en: The blame of delinquency may be laid at the door of careless parents.
sentences.cn: 少年犯罪可能要归咎于父母的放纵.

sentences.en: The captain's delinquency led to the loss of the ship.
sentences.cn: 船长失职而损失了一艘轮船.

sentences.en: the ever-rising statistics of delinquency and crime
sentences.cn: 青少年违法犯罪不断增加的统计数字

sentences.en: We can curb juvenile delinquency by education.
sentences.cn: 我们可以通过教育来控制少年犯罪.

words.tran_cn: 有过失的；怠忽的；拖欠债务的
流氓；行为不良的人；失职者

trans.tran_cn: 不法行为，少年罪犯，过失， 罪过
trans.tran_en: illegal or immoral behaviour or actions, especially by young people
